entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
